description.zh-cn: 中华民国直辖市与台湾六都之一，地处台湾西南部。辖域面积达2,952平方公里，是台湾面积最大的市。旧称“打狗”，日治时期因读音相近而更名为“高雄”。由于市内拥有台湾第一大港高雄港，故有“港都”之别称。
description.en: A special municipality of the Republic of China and one of the six special municipalities in Taiwan, located in southwestern Taiwan. With an area of 2,952 square kilometers, it is the largest city in Taiwan by area. Formerly known as 'Takau' (打狗), its name was changed to 'Kaohsiung' during the Japanese rule period due to a similar pronunciation in Japanese. It is also known as the 'Harbor Capital' due to having Taiwan's largest port, the Port of Kaohsiung.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，现任高雄市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, currently serving as the Mayor of Kaohsiung.

description.zh-cn: 高雄市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Kaohsiung City.

description.zh-cn: 高雄市的最高民意机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of Kaohsiung City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾日治时期的最高统治机关。
description.en: The supreme ruling body during the period of Japanese rule in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 南明将领，明郑王朝的开创者，从荷兰东印度公司手中夺取台湾。
description.en: A Ming dynasty general and founder of the Kingdom of Tungning, who seized Taiwan from the Dutch East India Company.

description.zh-cn: 明郑时期设立的行政区，范围约为今日的高雄地区。
description.en: An administrative division established during the Kingdom of Tungning, covering the area of present-day Kaohsiung.

description.zh-cn: 郑成功长子，明郑王朝第二位统治者。
description.en: Eldest son of Koxinga and the second ruler of the Kingdom of Tungning.

description.zh-cn: 清朝将领，率军攻取台湾，结束明郑时期。
description.en: A Qing dynasty admiral who led the conquest of Taiwan, ending the Kingdom of Tungning.

description.zh-cn: 明郑王朝末代君主。
description.en: The last ruler of the Kingdom of Tungning.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战末期，美军对高雄市的战略轰炸行动。
description.en: Strategic bombing campaign against Kaohsiung by the United States military during the late stages of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 1979年在高雄市发生的一场重大警民冲突事件，对台湾之后的民主化进程有重要影响。
description.en: A major confrontation between police and civilians that occurred in Kaohsiung in 1979, which had a significant impact on Taiwan's subsequent democratization process.

description.zh-cn: 台湾党外运动时期的重要政治杂志，其成员为美丽岛事件的核心人物。
description.en: An important political magazine during Taiwan's Tangwai movement, whose members were central figures in the Kaohsiung Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 2010年中华民国县市改制直辖市

zh-cn: 2010年中华民国县市改制直辖市

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政区划的重大调整，多个县市进行合并或升格。
description.en: A major adjustment of administrative divisions in the Republic of China, where several counties and cities were merged or upgraded.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省下的一个县，2010年与高雄市合并。
description.en: A former county of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, which merged with Kaohsiung City in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 2010年县市合并前的高雄市。
description.en: Kaohsiung City before the 2010 county-city merger.

description.zh-cn: 2014年发生在高雄市前镇区与苓雅区的石化气管连环爆炸事件，造成重大伤亡。
description.en: A series of gas explosions originating from petrochemical pipelines in the Cianjhen and Lingya districts of Kaohsiung in 2014, resulting in significant casualties.

description.zh-cn: 一起发生在台湾南部的强烈地震，对台南市造成了严重破坏。
description.en: A powerful earthquake in southern Taiwan that caused severe damage in Tainan City.

description.zh-cn: 位于高雄市旗山区，为主祀妈祖的庙宇，为直辖市定古迹。
description.en: A temple dedicated to the sea goddess Mazu located in Cishan District, Kaohsiung, designated as a municipal monument.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任高雄市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Kuomintang party, former mayor of Kaohsiung.

nodes.id: 2020年高雄市市长韩国瑜罢免案

zh-cn: 2020年高雄市市长韩国瑜罢免案

description.zh-cn: 中华民国史上首次成功的直辖市市长罢免案。
description.en: The first successful recall vote against a special municipality mayor in the history of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任高雄市市长，现任监察院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, former mayor of Kaohsiung, and current President of the Control Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 汉传佛教临济宗僧侣，佛光山的开山宗长。
description.en: A Chinese Buddhist monk of the Linji school and the founder of the Fo Guang Shan Buddhist order.

description.zh-cn: 台湾最大的佛门丛林，由释星云于1967年创办，为汉传佛教临济宗法脉传承之佛教道场。
description.en: The largest Buddhist monastery in Taiwan, founded in 1967 by Hsing Yun. It is a Buddhist order of the Linji school of Chan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 陈其迈在2020年高雄市市长补选中当选，并于2022年连任。
description.en: Chen Chi-mai was elected in the 2020 Kaohsiung mayoral by-election and was re-elected in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 1920年，台湾总督府正式公布将原名“打狗”改名为“高雄”。
description.en: In 1920, the Governor-General of Taiwan officially announced the renaming of 'Takau' (打狗) to 'Kaohsiung' (高雄).

description.zh-cn: 郑成功驱逐荷兰人后，设立一府二县，其中万年县的范围涵盖了今日的高雄地区。
description.en: After expelling the Dutch, Koxinga established one prefecture and two counties, with Wannian County covering the area of modern-day Kaohsiung.

description.zh-cn: 郑经是郑成功的儿子。
description.en: Zheng Jing was the son of Koxinga.

description.zh-cn: 施琅率领清军征讨台湾，迫使明郑末代君主郑克塽投降。
description.en: Shi Lang led the Qing forces to conquer Taiwan, forcing Zheng Keshuang, the last ruler of the Kingdom of Tungning, to surrender.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战末期，美军的密集空袭对高雄港与市区造成了严重破坏。
description.en: During the late stages of World War II, intensive air raids by the US military caused severe damage to the Port of Kaohsiung and the city area.

description.zh-cn: 以《美丽岛》杂志社成员为核心的党外人士组织群众游行，引发了美丽岛事件。
description.en: Tangwai activists, centered around the members of Formosa Magazine, organized a mass protest that triggered the Kaohsiung Incident.

description.zh-cn: 当时的国民党政府派遣军警全面镇压美丽岛事件的示威群众。
description.en: The Kuomintang government at the time dispatched military and police forces to suppress the protesters of the Kaohsiung Incident.

relationships.source: 2010年中华民国县市改制直辖市

description.zh-cn: 在此次行政区划改制中，原高雄市与高雄县合并，成为新的直辖市高雄市。
description.en: In this administrative division reform, the original Kaohsiung City and Kaohsiung County were merged to form the new special municipality of Kaohsiung City.

relationships.source: 2010年中华民国县市改制直辖市

description.zh-cn: 因与高雄市合并，高雄县的行政法人地位消灭。
description.en: Due to the merger with Kaohsiung City, the administrative legal entity of Kaohsiung County was dissolved.

relationships.source: 2010年中华民国县市改制直辖市

description.zh-cn: 因与高雄县合并，原直辖市高雄市的行政法人地位消灭。
description.en: Due to the merger with Kaohsiung County, the administrative legal entity of the original special municipality of Kaohsiung City was dissolved.

description.zh-cn: 该气爆事故对高雄市造成严重破坏，导致32人死亡、321人受伤。
description.en: The gas explosion incident caused severe damage to Kaohsiung City, resulting in 32 deaths and 321 injuries.

description.zh-cn: 高雄美浓地震导致旗山天后宫的寺庙牌楼装饰被震碎、掉落。
description.en: The Kaohsiung Meinong earthquake caused the decorative elements on the temple archway of Cishan Tianhou Temple to shatter and fall.

relationships.source: 2020年高雄市市长韩国瑜罢免案

description.zh-cn: 韩国瑜因罢免案通过而被解除高雄市市长职务。
description.en: Han Kuo-yu was removed from his position as Mayor of Kaohsiung after the recall vote passed.

description.zh-cn: 释星云于1967年创办佛光山。
description.en: Hsing Yun founded Fo Guang Shan in 1967.
